http://www.oxyshare.com/get/6579847544cb817f71e020.57319352/X3Reunionv1.4.0.3NoDVDFixedexeEng.rar.html

guys, u dont need 2 unplug ur ide cables 2 make a game like this 2 work on daemon tools (power iso) virtual drive.

u jus need 2 go 2 ur local disk (c) and right click, a box will appear, click on the hardware tab, then click (2 highlight) the cd/dvd rom drive(s) that u have, another box will appear, go to the bottom, u will see that it tells u its enabled, so, disable it (if u have more than 1 rom drive, disable what u have).

after that, u can mount ur game on the daemon tools (or power iso) virtual drive and there u have it.

after gameplay, jus go 2 ur local disk (c) and so forth and enable them back

it does work, ive done it loads of times

good luck!
